document_data.name: Amin Nur
document_data.mainbody: '''Nur''', or '''Amin Nur''', was an official of [[Dihliz]] in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}{{cite book/Ruined Kingdoms/Campaign Guide|17}}
document_data.Personality: Amin Nur was a keenly intelligent individual who possessed an eye for intrigue. As his name suggested, he was a trusted ally of Emira [[Hassana Alim al-Gaib]].
document_data.Activities: Amin Nur headed the [[Ministry of Secrets]], an appointment granted to him by the Emira after years of loyal service.
document_data.History: Amin Nur was an [[Zakharan pantheon|unenlightened Zakharan]] from the [[Haunted Lands]].
